text: mariyu niscayanga, memu lukhman ku vivekanni prasadincamu, atanu allah ku krtajnuduga undalani. Mariyu evadaite ayanaku krtajnatalu teluputado, atadu niscayanga, tana melu korake krtajnatalu teluputadu. Mariyu krtaghnataku palpadina vadu, niscayanga allah svayam samrd'dhudu, sarvastotralaku ar'hudani (telusukovali)
